title: Diverse Tasks of a Farmer
text: Cleaning the barn. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We record yields and monitor feed intake. We follow safety steps in the barn. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. We start work before sunrise during harvest. This is my routine at the dairy farm. I use simple tools for daily tasks. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. I adjust irrigation when the soil is dry. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. In winter we protect equipment from freezing.
